Portfolio

The portfolio presents a range of projects, reflecting my experience with chat apps, mobile development, admin dashboards, interactive maps, and multilingual websites — built with modern technologies like Wordpress, Nuxt, Vue, and React Native. These works emphasize clean architecture, responsive design, and a user-centered approach.

xDock

xDock is a powerful platform that simplifies distribution and logistics by connecting drivers with cross-dock facilities, warehouses, and storage points across the country.

Blue ridge suppliers

A one-stop shop offering a wide range of high-quality building materials tailored to meet the unique needs of contractors and construction professionals.

Serve Freight

ServeFreight is a digital platform that connects shippers with top-tier carriers to ensure fast, reliable, and cost-effective transportation solutions.

Patton cap

Patton Cap specializes in crafting custom homes throughout Western North Carolina, delivering quality construction and personalized service for every client.

Jump Cup

JumpCup transforms your daily coffee run into an adventure with bold flavors, unique drinks, and a vibrant customer experience you’ll want to repeat.

Xcold

Xcold offers specialized cold chain logistics with expert temperature control and monitoring for perishable goods, ensuring freshness and safety.

Zelh

Zelh helps businesses scale by building remote teams, optimizing operations, and handling administrative tasks so clients can focus on growth.

Zelh AI

Zelh AI solves complex operational challenges through custom solutions that combine automation, AI, and human expertise to accelerate results.

Zelh Logistics

Zelh Logistics provides tailored staffing and outsourcing services for logistics companies, helping streamline workflows and reduce operational costs.

Zelh Academy

Zelh Academy offers career guidance and professional training programs designed to help individuals grow and succeed in the logistics industry.

Zelh Tech

Zelh Tech blends strategy, technology, and design to deliver high-impact digital solutions — from MVP launch to full-scale product growth.

Logistics Zelh Tech

Logistics Zelh Tech supports freight brokerage companies with scalable growth tools, tech integrations, and process automation tailored to the industry.
